document.full_text: another dry week in the southern united states has driven the spread of a devastating drought further across texas and neighboring states, promising to add to economic losses that could top $3 billion.
document.title: drought expands dramatically in texas, losses mount
lines_and_colors: another dry week in the southern united states has driven the spread of a devastating drought further across texas and neighboring states, promising to add to economic losses that could top $3 billion.
